p: Composite soil samples were taken from the study plots and the physical-chemical properties as well as the granulometric composition of soil was determined: pH (in an aqueous solution and in a 1N KCl solution), N T—total nitrogen according to PN-ISO 11261, P—available phosphorus according to PN-R-04023, and FL—fraction of floatable parts using the Prószyński’ aerometric method PN-R-04033 [ 49].
